org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.mapreduce

Class MapReduceRestoreJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.mapreduce.MapReduceRestoreJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, RestoreJob

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class MapReduceRestoreJob
extends Object
implements RestoreJob
    MapReduce implementation of RestoreJob For backup restore, it runs MapReduceHFileSplitterJob job and creates HFiles which are aligned with a region boundaries of a table being restored. The resulting HFiles then are loaded using HBase bulk load tool LoadIncrementalHFiles
